item.title: 'Mass Effect Legendary Edition' comparison trailer shows off the upgrades
item.description: A 4K look at all the improvements coming to the Mass Effect trilogy next month.

item.title: Fortnite’s next crossover character is Aloy from ‘Horizon Zero Dawn’
item.description: Epic Games is teaming her up with Lara Croft for a limited-time event.

item.title: Apple TV+ docuseries will explore high-tech music production with Mark Ronson
item.description: 'Watch the Sound with Mark Ronson' premieres on July 30th on Apple TV+.

item.title: Discord blocks adult NSFW servers on its iOS app
item.description: Those communities are still available on Android and other platforms.

item.title: Epic announces billion-dollar funding round ahead of Apple trial
item.description: Sony has increased its stake in the company with a $200 million investment.

item.title: The Polestar 2 is getting a cheaper, single-motor option
item.description: The EV will have a longer range in cooler climates if you add a new heat pump.

item.title: Apple confirms April 20th launch event, new iPads and Macs expected
item.description: Mark your calendars, friends: Apple has just sent out invitations for a launch event on April 20th at 10:00 AM Pacific/1:00 PM Eastern, where the company is expected to pull back the curtain on a slate of refreshed tablets and PCs.

item.title: AMD unveils its first Ryzen 5000 CPUs with built-in graphics
item.description: AMD has unveiled its first Ryzen 5000-series chips with built-in graphics, and it's promising a leap in performance over Intel equivalents.

item.title: Playpulse's smart exercise bike lets you choose between workout classes and Netflix
item.description: The Playpulse One lets you attend classes, play games, and watch TV all while riding.

item.title: This $79 smartwatch is actually a metronome for musicians
item.description: Condense your old practice equipment with this smartwatch that can be worn on your chest, wrist or leg. Stronger vibrations and simple controls make this wearable a great tool for musicians of all kinds.

item.title: Nintendo’s Switch Lite will soon come in deep blue
item.description: The new colorway drops the same day as Miitopia.

item.title: Android's latest feature reminds you to avoid distracted walking
item.description: Google is rolling out a 'Heads Up' feature on Android that will remind you to stop using your phone while you're walking.

item.title: Facebook's speed-dating app gives you four minutes to impress
item.description: The experimental video app Sparked has no public profiles or Tinder-style swiping.

item.title: You can now store PS5 games on a USB drive
item.description: Sony is rolling out the first major PS5 system update on April 14th, and it adds support for storing the new console's games on USB drives.

item.title: Facebook's Portal+ smart display is on sale for $200 right now
item.description: Save big on Facebook's Portal+ smart display at QVC, where you can get it for 29 percent off.

item.title: Google is working to bring Sony's 360 Reality Audio to Android
item.description: Google could be working with Sony to integrate 360 Reality Audio into its Android software.

item.title: Dell's refreshed Inspiron line includes a 16-inch laptop
item.description: In addition to the typical performance upgrades we see every year, the company is also unveiling the Inspiron 16 Plus

item.title: Roku unveils an Express 4K+ set-top box and its first rechargeable remote
item.description: Roku's entry-level streaming box is getting a 4K upgrade: the $40 Roku Express 4K+. And it's finally unveiling a rechargeable voice remote.

item.title: Spotify's voice-controlled 'Car Thing' is available for some subscribers
item.description: Spotify admitted its voice-controlled in-car streaming player existed in 2019. Now you might have a chance to actually use it.

item.title: Microsoft's Surface Laptop 4 features Intel and AMD CPUs
item.description: Almost a year and a half since launching the Surface Laptop 3, Microsoft is finally ready with a follow-up. The Surface Laptop 4 continues the line's tradition of being, well, kind of basic.

item.title: Microsoft's new 'Modern' accessories include its first webcam in years
item.description: Microsoft is launching a range of new workplace-oriented accessories, including a webcam and Surface Headphones 2+, that are certified to work with Teams.

item.title: Roku's OS 10 brings AirPlay 2 and HomeKit support to its HD streaming devices
item.description: Roku has started rolling out its latest operating system, and it will gives its HD streaming devices AirPlay 2 and HomeKit compatibility.

item.title: Dell's XPS 13 now comes with an optional $300 OLED display
item.description: Starting today, you can pay an extra $300 on the price of the Full HD model to configure a new XPS 13 with a 3,456 x 2,160 OLED panel.

item.title: Facebook's Oversight Board will consider appeals to remove content
item.description: Facebook's Oversight Board now accepts appeals to remove content, not just restore it.

item.title: The Morning After: Even NASA’s Mars drone needs software updates
item.description: Today’s headlines: Domino’s starts making autonomous pizza deliveries, Apple is reportedly working on a speaker with Apple TV built-in and NASA’s Mars drone needed a software update.
